inclusion.criterion: no previous diagnosis of rhythm disorder
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: on examination on the ECG, the patient was not in sinus rhythm
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: that the patient has a known heart rhythm disorder and / or is being treated for it
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a 57-year-old farmer with Parkinson's disease. He experiences slowness of movement and tremors, but his medications help with shaking and slow movement.
